backend/main.mo: Defines passage data, session tracking, and exposes queries to fetch passages by language and record typing sessions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementations with associated frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all major frontend files covering typing, history, services, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App layout defining header, TypingPractice view, and footer with branding and external link.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryPan: Renders recent typing test history with language, duration, WPM, accuracy, and timestamps.
frontend/src/features/history/historySto: Manages localStorage-backed test history with add, get, and clear operations.
frontend/src/features/history/useHistory: React Query wrapper for reading/updating history with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/features/typing/components/: Duration picker providing selectable test times using toggle buttons.
Renders the passage with per-character correctness and current-position highlighting using Unicode-aware segmentation.
Displays final typing stats with performance badges and metrics like WPM, accuracy, and errors.
Shows a live status bar with time remaining, WPM, accuracy, and error count.
frontend/src/features/typing/TypingPract: Main typing workflow handling language, passage loading, typing engine, results, and backend session recording.
frontend/src/features/typing/unicode.ts: Provides Unicode-safe text segmentation and comparison utilities for accurate typing evaluation.
Fetches a random passage for a given language using React Query and exposes loading and refetch controls.
frontend/src/features/typing/useTypingEn: Implements the core typing test logic including timing, input handling, state transitions, and stat calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handlers, and identity loading on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, as query logic is handled in feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables including color tokens and character-state utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/services/passages.ts: Fetches passages by language from the backend actor with lazy actor initialization.
frontend/src/services/sessions.ts: Records typing sessions to the backend using a lazily-created actor.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, typography and animation extensions, and includes several Tailwind plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, existing features, new feature requests, and image requirements for a bilingual typing‑practice web app.
